member.name: T:pgis.My.MyWpfExtension
member.summary: Module used to define the properties that are available in the My Namespace for WPF

member.name: P:pgis.My.MyWpfExtension.Application
member.summary: Returns the application object for the running application

member.name: P:pgis.My.MyWpfExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:pgis.My.MyWpfExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current user. If you wish to run the application with the current Windows user credentials, call My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser().

member.name: P:pgis.My.MyWpfExtension.Log
member.summary: Returns the application log. The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.

member.name: P:pgis.My.MyWpfExtension.Windows
member.summary: Returns the collection of Windows defined in the project.

member.name: T:pgis.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:pgis.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:pgis.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: M:pgis.meineExtensionsIsnullorempty.ToLogString(System.Exception,System.String)

summary.para: Creates a log-string from the Exception.
The result includes the stacktrace, innerexception et cetera, separated by .

member.param: The exception to create the string from.
Additional message to place at the top of the string, maybe be empty or null.
